title: Looking for a Botlane Duo for a casual Ranked 5 team
body:
We have 4 people atm but none of us can play bot lane. 1 of us will be a sub.
So we need a good bot lane that has played together. Preferably with a decent champion pool.
Couples are welcome, we already have 1 in the team :3 
Add Oliver Twist for more info.

replies.body: Well I don't have a duo partner but if u throw your sub as support and and I ad they can prob learn a bit off me playing bot lane. Diamond 5 Adc/Supp Main

add me: Juicy Cupcake
Im Gold 4 in NA, main Supp mid. 
In Oce, im start rank and currently Silver 2, can play any role as required, best with supp/mid
